sentences.en: A thin layer of topsoil was swept away.
sentences.cn: 薄薄的一层表土被冲走了。

sentences.en: According to scientists, it takes nature 500 years to create an inch of topsoil.
sentences.cn: 根据科学家们的看法，自然界要用500年的时间才能形成一英寸的表层土壤。

sentences.en: After shoveling out the topsoil, Garfinkel uncovered coins and other artifacts from the time of Alexander the Great.
sentences.cn: 在铲去了表层土以后，加芬克尔发现了来自亚历山大大帝时期的硬币和其他人工制品。

sentences.en: Do you know what topsoil is made of?
sentences.cn: 你知道表土是由什么构成的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dump the topsoil here.
sentences.cn: 把表土倒在这里。

sentences.en: In ABC soil, the uppermost zone of soil , containing humus ; topsoil.
sentences.cn: 位于 上层 土和岩床之间的一层土壤.

sentences.en: No other animal is so useful in building up good topsoil.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓对制造优良的表层土壤所起的作用是其他任何动物都比不上的.

sentences.en: Stone is the foundation, above which is soil, and then topsoil.
sentences.cn: 石头是基础，上面是泥土，再上面是表土。

sentences.en: Straw mulching, cultivating and hoeing , regulating the root distribution in the topsoil are effective measures to reduce the soil evaporation.
sentences.cn: 秸秆覆盖、中耕锄划、调控表层土壤根系分布等可作为减少土壤蒸发的有效措施。

sentences.en: The auxiliary shaft topsoil adopted ordinary construction and drainages in hygrometric well.
sentences.cn: 屯留煤矿副井井筒表土段采用普通法施工,利用井外降水井疏干降水.

sentences.en: The fragile land quickly lost its topsoil and became nothing but sand and dust.
sentences.cn: 那单薄的土地很快就失去了表土,成为沙粒和尘埃.

sentences.en: The soils here are sandy and dominated by gravel topsoil.
sentences.cn: 那里的土壤是沙质化的,绝大部分是砂砾表层土.

sentences.en: The topsoil has been almost completely washed away.
sentences.cn: 表层土壤已差不多完全给冲走了.

sentences.en: This causes environmental damage when the topsoil is washed away by the rains.
sentences.cn: 雨水冲走表层土壤会造成环境破坏。

sentences.en: This topsoil tends to wash away.
sentences.cn: 表层土壤要冲掉了.

sentences.en: Topsoil excavated from the work site shall be applied onto the gabions.
sentences.cn: 从工地挖出的表土须用于筑堤的石笼上.

sentences.en: Under flood conditions, great amounts of topsoil are washed to receiving streams.
sentences.cn: 在洪水泛滥时, 大量表层土壤被冲刷到承受的水流中.

sentences.en: When all topsoil is gone, nothing remains but a worthless desert.
sentences.cn: 当表层土流失后, 就只剩下一片无用的沙漠.

sentences.en: When the black topsoil was all washed away, farmers moved westward and started new plantations.
sentences.cn: 当表层黑土全部被冲走之后, 农民们就向西部转移,建立新的种植园.

sentences.en: Worse still, the annual torrential rains washed the topsoil from the hillside.
sentences.cn: 更糟的是, 每年都有暴雨把浮土从山坡上冲走.

trans.tran_en: the upper level of soil in which most plants have their roots
